definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: Objective To know mental health of train driver in Hangzhou engine department.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲了解杭州機務段機車司機的心理健康狀況。

sentences.english: This article discusses mainly the application of the theory of Markov Chains in the configuration of Locomotive Depot.
sentences.chinese: 主要運用馬爾可夫鏈來研究機務段中機車的配屬問題。
